auto;overflow-y:hidden;overflow-x:scroll;-ms-overflow-style:none;scrollbar-width:none}section .product_card_layout::-webkit-scrollbar{display:none}section .product_card{width:14rem;height:100%;background:#f1f1f1;border-radius:.3rem;box-shadow:1px 1px 1px #f1f1f1}section .image_container{display:flex;justify-content:center;margin-top:.1rem;width:100%;border-radius:.3rem}section .image_container img{display:inline-block;object-fit:cover}section .price_details_container{width:100%;height:6rem;display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;justify-content:center;margin:0 auto}section .name,section .price,section .store{font-family:Franklin Gothic Medium,Arial Narrow,Arial,sans-serif;font-size:1rem;text-transform:capitalize;margin-bottom:.5rem;color:#dd1b1b}section .store{font-size:1rem;text-transform:capitalize;color:#999}.collections_container{background:#fff;width:100%}.collections{height:100%;overflow-y:none!important;-ms-overflow-style:none;scrollbar-width:none}.collections::-webkit-scrollbar{display:none}.collections_header{width:100%;height:3rem;padding-top:1rem}.collections_header h1{font-size:1.6rem;font-weight:600;text-transform:capitalize;text-align:center;color:#2a0845}.collections_header .lines{height:.3rem;border-radius:15px;width:6rem;margin:.5rem auto 0}.collections_layout{width:100%;height:100%;max-width:70rem;display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(1,1fr);grid-template-rows:1fr;grid-gap:1rem;justify-items:center;align-items:center;margin:0 auto 1rem}.collections_product_card{position:relative;width:15rem;height:20rem;background:#fff;border-radius:.3rem;border-bottom-left-radius:.5rem;border-bottom-right-radius:.5rem;margin:0 auto;transition:all .2s ease}.collections_product_card img{object-fit:cover!important}@media screen and (min-width:345px){.collections_layout{grid-template-columns:repeat(2,1fr)}.collections_product_card{width:10rem!important;margin-top:.3rem!important}}@media screen and (min-width:400px){.collections_layout{grid-template-columns:repeat(2,1fr);grid-gap:.1rem!important}.collections_product_card{width:12rem}}@media screen and (min-width:500px){.collections_layout{grid-template-columns:repeat(3,1fr);grid-gap:.1rem!important}.collections_product_card{width:10rem;margin-top:.3rem!important}}@media screen and (min-width:768px){.collections_layout{grid-template-columns:repeat(3,1fr);grid-template-rows:1fr}.collections_product_card{width:15rem!important}}@media screen and (min-width:1024px){.collections_layout{grid-template-columns:repeat(4,1fr);grid-gap:.2rem}}.collections_product_card:hover{box-shadow:2px 2px 10px 10px #ccc}.discount_container{position:absolute;top:1rem;right:0;height:1.5rem;width:6rem;background:#dd1b1b;border-top-right-radius:.2rem;border-bottom-left-radius:2rem;border-top-left-radius:2rem;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center}.discount{font-size:1rem;font-weight:lighter;text-transform:capitalize;text-align:center;color:#fff}.product_name,.product_price,.store{display:inline-block;width:100%;text-transform:capitalize;margin-bottom:.1rem;margin-top:.2rem;text-align:center;color:#2a0845}.collections_details_container{width:100%;display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;justify-content:center;padding-bottom:.5rem}.product_name,.product_price{font-size:1rem;font-family:Georgia,Times New Roman,Times,serif}.store{font-size:.8rem;font-weight:lighter}.collection_call{width:100%;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:space-evenly}.add_cart{display:inline-block;border-radius:.2rem;font-size:1.2rem;font-weight:lighter;text-transform:capitalize;padding:.7rem;cursor:pointer;margin-top:.5rem;background:#dd1b1b;color:#fff;border:none;transition:transform .5 ease}.add_cart:active{transform:translateY(3px)}.seperator_container{width:100%;height:17rem}.seperator{height:100%;width:100%;background-image:linear-gradient(rgba(1,1,1,.679),rgba(0,0,0,.3)),url(/16fe0c47df9cbdfe533eee836a1a9a35.jpg);background-attachment:fixed;background-size:cover;background-position:50%;background-repeat:no-repeat;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center}.text_content{height:6rem;width:20rem;background-color:hsla(0,0%,100%,.57);box-shadow:0 0 5px 1px #ccc;margin:0 .3rem}.text_content h1{font-size:2rem;font-weight:700;margin:.5rem 0;color:#fff}.text_content h1,.text_content p{text-align:center;text-transform:capitalize}.text_content p{font-size:1.5rem;font-weight:lighter;font-style:italic;color:#dd1b1b}@media screen and (min-width:768px){.text_content{width:50%}.seperator_container{margin-top:1rem}}.container_review{height:16rem;width:100%;background:#2a0845}.review_container{height:100%;width:100%;max-width:64rem;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;margin:auto;overflow-x:scroll;-ms-overflow-style:none;scrollbar-width:none}.review_container::-webkit-scrollbar{display:none}.individual_review{position:relative;height:11rem;width:15.5rem;background:#2a0845;box-shadow:1px 1px 5px 3px #0e0218;border-radius:.5rem;margin-left:1.5rem;margin-top:1rem}.individual_review .reviewer_image{width:4.5rem;height:4.5rem;position:absolute;top:-1.9rem;left:-1rem}.individual_review img{width:4.5rem;height:4.5rem;border:2px solid #2a0845;border-radius:.5rem}.individual_review .text_container{height:100%;width:100%}.individual_review .reviewer_heading{display:inline-block;width:9rem;height:1rem;margin-left:3.5rem;margin-top:.8rem}.individual_review .reviewer_heading h1{font-size:1.2rem;color:#4caf50}.individual_review .reviewer_heading h1,.individual_review .reviewer_location p,.individual_review P{font-weight:400;text-align:center;text-transform:capitalize;font-family:Cambria,Cochin,Georgia,Times,Times New Roman,serif}.individual_review .reviewer_location p,.individual_review P{font-size:1rem}.individual_review .reviewer_location{display:inline-block;width:7rem;height:1rem;margin-left:3.4rem;margin-top:.1rem}.individual_review .reviewer_location p{color:#999}.individual_review .comments{display:inline-block;height:6rem;margin-top:1.5rem;overflow:hidden}.individual_review P{text-align:left;margin-left:.6rem;line-height:1.1rem;color:#f1f1f1!important}.down{margin-top:-.5rem}footer{height:22rem;width:100%;background:#ccc}.newsletter{width:100%;max-width:64rem;height:100%;display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;justify-content:space-between;margin:0 auto}.newsletter::placeholder{text-align:center}.about_footer a,.about_footer h6,.developer_brand .copyright,.developer_brand .date,.email_container h6{font-size:1.1rem;text-transform:capitalize;text-align:center;font-family:Cambria,Cochin,Georgia,Times,Times New Roman,serif}.email_container{height:5rem;width:18rem;margin-top:.6rem}.email_container h4{font-size:1.4rem;text-transform:capitalize;font-family:Cambria,Cochin,Georgia,Times,Times New Roman,serif;text-align:center;margin-bottom:.3rem}.email_container h6{margin-bottom:.3rem}.email_container .email{width:100%;height:2.3rem;margin:.7rem auto;overflow:hidden;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center}.email_container input{padding:.5rem;border:none;border-radius:.1rem;text-indent:1rem;margin-right:.1rem}.email_container input:focus{outline-color:#2a0845}.email_container .arrow{top:0;display:inline-block;padding:.5rem;background:#2a0845;cursor:pointer}.email_container .fa-chevron-right{font-size:.7rem}.socialmedia_container{height:6rem;width:18rem;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center}.socialmedia_container .footer__icon{margin:1rem}.about_footer{width:16rem;height:4rem}.about_footer h1{font-size:1.1rem;text-transform:capitalize;text-align:center}.about_footer h6{margin:.4rem 0}.about_footer a{display:block}.line{height:.01rem;width:98%;background:#2a0845;margin:.6rem auto 0}.developer_brand{height:4rem;width:10rem;margin:0 auto;color:#2a0845}.developer_brand .copyright{display:block;margin:.5rem auto}.developer_brand .date{display:block}@media screen and (min-width:768px){footer{height:15rem}.newsletter{height:13rem;margin-top:.6rem;flex-direction:row}.fa-chevron-right{font-size:1rem!important;transform:none;color:#f1f1f1}.line{margin-top:-2.5rem!important}}
